mapper.select: select * from product where pIsTransaction=false order by product_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (pName, pCategory, pPrice, userNickname, pLocation, pDate, pIsTransaction, pImage, pExplain) VALUES (#{pName},#{pCategory},#{pPrice}, #{userNickname},#{pLocation},#{pDate}, #{pIsTransaction},#{pImage},#{pExplain});
